mapper.select:
SELECT child.id,child.start_time,child.end_time ,child.pay_cash_num,child.other_pay_num,child.other_rate,child.timeout_rate, child.free_rate_num ,child.order_state,room.room_name,`type`.room_type_name,child.al_room_code,child.night_auditor_state, child.print_state,child.remark,per.name,oder.channel,oder.order_type as passengerSource,oder.OTA,oder.order_number,child.main
FROM hm_order oder LEFT JOIN hm_order_child child ON child.order_id=oder.id LEFT JOIN hm_room room ON room.id=child.room_id LEFT JOIN hm_room_type type ON type.id=child.room_type_id LEFT JOIN hm_check_in_person per ON per.order_child_id = child.id
WHERE per.`status`='yes' LIMIT 0,1
